title: ledu_ico
author: ledu_ico
content: Difference between Bear market And Bull MarketIs it advisable to buy crypto during the bear market or rather buy crypto during the bull market. Picture below tells the difference between the Bear market and Bull market.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: I'm not sure if you got the whole picture correct because it didn't refer to crypto as a whole. And obviously, in crypto market, bear market is when the price goes down hard and this might take 2-3 years. As compare to stocks that might recover in short amount of time.And if you wanted to make money, then buy at the dip in bear market and then wait for the next bull run to happen (usually right after bitcoin halving, as this process is the catalyst).

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: ledu_ico on May 25, 2022, 11:16:33 AMIs it advisable to buy crypto during the bear market or rather buy crypto during the bull market. It's always advisable to buy crypto during the bearish market. The cycle will always be buying when it was bearish and then sell when it was bullish. So many people will be scared during the bearish trend. The bad thing is when people are thinking to buy during the pump and sell during the dump. One thing that must be known by anyone if they shall not buy any tokens that owned by scammers just like when the owner of token was refusing to pay the salary for its bounty manager. The scam project is a thing that must be avoided.

comments.author: crypto-project
comments.body: Yes, it's true that buying crypto on a bear market is very good, but it should be noted that keep investing with good financial planning, never invest with money that you don't want to lose.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: crypto-project on May 25, 2022, 12:39:28 PMYes, it's true that buying crypto on a bear market is very good, but it should be noted that keep investing with good financial planning, never invest with money that you don't want to lose.This is suggested very well for the altcoins but when you put it in bitcoin, you only need to have the right guide which is to invest only what you can afford to lose to avoid regret and confusion since the recovery of the price this time is not fast than we used to have in the last 2 years. A bear market might sound opportunity to others but in reality, the best way to take advantage of it is to find the best coin that will have a high chance to recover once the bull market comes back because not all of the coins in the market will recover in the future for some of them will remain at their lower price forever.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Let's say your picture are correct about the difference between the bear and bull market. I don't understand why most traders trade on bull market? Bull market is considered the price will always increase, trading in bull market can reduced your profit since you didn't sell at the peak. If you're still holding, you can sell when the price is on the peak.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: ledu_ico on May 25, 2022, 11:16:33 AMDifference between Bear market And Bull MarketIs it advisable to buy crypto during the bear market or rather buy crypto during the bull market...The main difference between a bear market and a bull market is that it is very easy to make a profit in a bull market, while it is very easy to lose it in a bear market. And those investors who fixed their profit in time are now watching the market, waiting for a good price of coins to buy.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Not every coins can recover post bear season so when you make your comparison between the two period bear in mind that only those coins you see will be able to withstand the bear market that deserves to be invested on, just because some projects becomes very cheap in price during the bear season does not mean they are worth putting money on.Like they say, bear period is the time to build a strong portfolio that will give you great profit during the bull season. So choose wisely.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: A bit surprised about the the Warning above the thread not gonna lie. Well just by looking at the chart it is clear as night and day on what bearish and bull market trends are.Â  This is a good chart for those that are still new to crypto.Panickers be like: "We panic both sides."

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: There are investors that prefer to buy before a bull run happens. There are signs that we can see if the market is going there and they're just tired of waiting buying during the bear market.But the most effective is really on that time of bear.Prices are too cheap and you'll make the most from it if you happen to have the idea of owning a lot of good coins that you've bought during the bearish market.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: investment more specifically in cryptocurrencies is all about timing. it's either you're making an entry in investing and get a great market position or you are getting fomo'd and buying at around the ATH.there is definitely some saying to buy at around the market correction but the question lies, at what point the market gonna bottoms out, and the same question for the bullish run as well, basically at what point the market gonna reached its most ATH.that is the difficulty of following that kind of investment advice since figuring out is the key of investment.

comments.author: crypto-project
comments.body: Quote from: yazher on May 25, 2022, 01:35:32 PMQuote from: crypto-project on May 25, 2022, 12:39:28 PMYes, it's true that buying crypto on a bear market is very good, but it should be noted that keep investing with good financial planning, never invest with money that you don't want to lose.This is suggested very well for the altcoins but when you put it in bitcoin, you only need to have the right guide which is to invest only what you can afford to lose to avoid regret and confusion since the recovery of the price this time is not fast than we used to have in the last 2 years. A bear market might sound opportunity to others but in reality, the best way to take advantage of it is to find the best coin that will have a high chance to recover once the bull market comes back because not all of the coins in the market will recover in the future for some of them will remain at their lower price forever. But it's not as easy as it seems to be able to find a potential coin, many coins in the crypto market that look "potential" but end up becoming trash tokens and instead cause losses to their holders, such as LUNA and UST.

comments.author: capedbaldy
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on May 25, 2022, 07:37:57 PMThere are investors that prefer to buy before a bull run happens. There are signs that we can see if the market is going there and they're just tired of waiting buying during the bear market.But the most effective is really on that time of bear.Prices are too cheap and you'll make the most from it if you happen to have the idea of owning a lot of good coins that you've bought during the bearish market.We can't predict the lowest price during a bear market but my assumption is that if the market drops 20% then the opportunity to buy gradually, I apply the trading method to buy gradually to reduce losses if my prediction is wrong because the price falls lower.
